item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Icegram Icegram Engage – WordPress Lead Generation, Popup Builder, CTA, Optins and Email List Building.This issue affects Icegram Engage – WordPress Lead Generation, Popup Builder, CTA, Optins and Email List Building: from n/a through 3.1.18.

item.title: CVE-2023-51532|2024-02-01T11:00:07.700Z -- icegram -- icegram%20engage%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20lead%20generation%2C%20popup%20builder%2C%20cta%2C%20optins%20and%20email%20list%20building
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Icegram Icegram Engage – WordPress Lead Generation, Popup Builder, CTA, Optins and Email List Building allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Icegram Engage – WordPress Lead Generation, Popup Builder, CTA, Optins and Email List Building: from n/a through 3.1.19.
